item.description:
Let's go biking on Cape Cod and try to beat the summer crowds and get a change of scenery too. 

7 Mile bike path between the Bourne and Sagamore bridges.  ﻿﻿﻿You can stop anywhere along the bike paths to rest, picnic, try some fishing, soak up the sun.

Because the Cape Cod Canal bike paths are entirely on the level, the Canal is a great bicycling spot for families that want an easy route with lots to see and do.

Buzzards Bay Recreation Area

It is on Main Street (Route 6), and has lots of parking. Take
Exit 3 off MA-25, and follow Route 6 West. The area will be on
your left, and is at the south end of the canal near the
railroad bridge.

I'll email my phone number to those who RSVP yes.  Hope to see some of you out there with me for a great ride, and a new place to explore. 
Maybe we'll find a spot along the way for lunch or ice cream or both.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the trailhead at Buzzards Bay Recreation Area
item.name: Bike the Cape Cod Canal Bicycle Trail
